001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
005
006import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
007
008public abstract class AbstractNodeItem implements INodeItem {
009
010  @Override
011  public final String toSignature() {
012    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder()
013        .append(getType().toSignature())
014        .append("⪻")
015        .append(getMetapath())
016        .append("⪼");
017    String value = getValueSignature();
018    if (value != null) {
019      builder.append("(");
020      builder.append(value);
021      builder.append(")");
022    }
023    return ObjectUtils.notNull(builder.toString());
024  }
025
026  @Nullable
027  protected abstract String getValueSignature();
028
029  @Override
030  public final String toString() {
031    return toSignature();
032  }
033}
